snippet.title: There's Still Hope For Constantine's To Return To Live-Action TV
snippet.content:
Greg Berlanti shoots down casting rumours for his Little Shop of Horrors remake. John Boyega teases speedy robots for Pacific Rim: Uprising. David Ramsey promises hell for Diggle in Arrow's next season. Plus, a new look at Syfy's next ridiculous original movie, and new clips from this week's Shadowhunters. Spoilers, assemble!
Little Shop of Horrors
Greg Berlanti has refuted the recent Josh Gad/Rebel Wilson casting rumours.
Berlanti also seemed to confirm the film would be set present day:
[]
Annihilation
The film adaptation of Jeff VanderMeer's novel, starring Natalie Portman, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Gina Rodriguez and Tessa Thompson, hits US theatres 23 February 2018. []
Shazam
Speaking with the , David F. Sanberg stated Shazam would be the most "lighthearted" DC film yet:
Transformers
reports Hasbro confirmed they're releasing a second theatrical, animated Transformers movie during their annual Investor Day.
Justice League
Here's a "new" trailer, which is basically the Comic-Con one with some extra lines of dialogue.
Most of the League is united in a new banner for the film. []
Lastly, Kiersey Clemons praised her scenes as "sick" when asked about the current reshoots by .
Avengers 4
While promoting his new film, Wind River, Jeremy Renner told he returns to the Avengers to film the fourth movie very soon:
Pacific Rim: Uprising
Speaking with , John Boyega promised that the new class of Jaegers in the movie are much more graceful than their predecessors.
Toxic Shark
Here's a trailer for a new Syfy original movie, Toxic Shark - it is, as the name suggests, about an arsenic-dripping shark. Never change, Syfy.
Legends of Tomorrow
Executive producer Phil Klemmer tells that the series is "actively campaigning" to bring Matt Ryan's Constantine aboard the Waverider for season 3 - which isn't a solid confirmation, but an attempt is being made, at least. Have we mentioned before how extremely good this show is?
The third episode of season three is titled "Zari", after , AKA Isis. Suffice to say, it's probably the episode she makes her debut in.
The Flash
Carlos Valdes told not everyone is happy to have Barry return to the team - start speculating now, but maybe Wally, if Barry's return means he once again loses his place as the premier speedster on Team Flash?
Arrow
David Ramsey revealed to the new season will put Diggle's character through the wringer. Poor Diggle.
Marc Guggenheim also revealed the show's writers already have plans for season seven:
[]
Transformers: Cyberverse
A new animated series directly following the events of Transformers: Robots in Disguise was also announced at Hasbro's Investor Day, alongside the aforementioned animated movie. []
Shadowhunters
Finally, here are two clips from this week's episode of Shadowhunters, "Hail and Farewell".
